br.marquee: Updated 4/2/20: In an abundance of caution for our students and staff, GCSC as a district will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. E-Learning Materials and updates will be provided on the website homepage.

img.alt: Go to Gary Area Career Center

div.p: Important updates and information regarding the Coronavirus will be available in the links provided to the right.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1490005716471 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-o-content-middle vc_row-flex

h6.a: Take another look at Gary schools.
View bus stop locations and pick-up times for each school.

div.h6: Check your child’s grades, attendance and connect with classroom teachers.
Teachers and administrators login portal to input student data, access the classroom, enter grades and take attendance.

div.h2: Take another look at Gary Schools!

div.p: We are Gary proud. We are Gary strong. We are Gary Schools!

p.a: Montessori, traditional and special education preschool curriculums.

div.p: We give our students in a safe and challenging place to learn.
Students in grades 6th - 8th get hands-on with new STEAM program.

p.a: GCSC offers college prep education with dual credit and AP courses.

div.p: The vision of the GCSC is to remain the premiere educational system, providing an enriched academic and multi-cultural learning environment that prepares our students to pursue the accomplishment of life goals.
